Montgomery Township is located in New Jersey and consists of two towns, Belle Mead, and Skillman. There is also a part with a Princeton address. It is located in Somerset County in Central New Jersey. Two neighboring towns are Princeton and Hillsborough. It is about an hour from New York City and Philadelphia.

is located in Montgomery and the address is 41 Airpark Road,Princeton, NJ 08540.

which are the most popular roads to take.  Route 206 also runs through the center of montgomery from Princeton to Hillsborough and is the major thruway of the town.
You need a car to get around. There is also public transportation in the form of bus stops which run along route 206.

is located on Montgomery Park, Belle Mead, New Jersey 08502. It is a great place to come with you family or spouse and get some exercise or just sit back and watch the local sporting events that take place there. There are soccer fields, basketball courts, picnic tables to each lunch on, two play grounds, a bike and walking path, as well as baseball fields, and great sledding hills during the winter.

located in the Montgomery Shopping Center. The address is 1325 Route 206, Skillman/Rocky Hill, NJ 08502. It has a variety of films as well as a concession stand where you can buy a variety of delicious movie snacks. It has a great ambiance and is in a convenient location.

With fall comes the Montgomery Highschool football games held at Cougar stadium at 1016 Route 601, which are widely celebrated in the town. The games charge a five dollar entry fee and host a consession stand that sells various snacks and foods at reasonable prices.
has the best bagels around. It is a huge hot spot where the locals go with a variety of all day breakfast items served on their fresh bagels made daily. It is located 1225 State Road, Princeton, NJ.
is a great Italian pizzeria with a variety of options at a reasonable price. It has casual setting with delicious food. It is located in 1200 Route 206 Montgomery Township, NJ 08540.

has delicious sushi at a great price. It is casual to dressy. You can choose to either sit down and eat or order take out. There is a wide variety of options on their menu. It is located 1378 Rt. 206, Skillman, NJ 08558.

has delicious soft crust pizza and a legacy of doing business in Montgomery for over 30 years. It has a casual atmosphere and prices in the 8-15 dollar range. It is located in the Montgomery shopping center at 1325 Route 206.

offers quality chinese food at a 20-30 dollar price per person. It has a semi-casual atmosphere and a wide menu from standard Chinese fare to exotic bubble teas. They offer both on site dining and take-out. Located at 1325 Route 206.

is a popular bar and restaurant in town. A family place for dinner and a hopping night spot for the late crowds. They have bands come to play music after dinner hours on the weekends as well as offer some great specials. The food is excellent and the dress is dressy/casual. It is located on 1290 U.S. 206, Skillman, NJ 08558.
